subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Poll
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I haven't used a box yet but I've tried for and gotten a lot of EVP. I never
did any sort of protective routine other than to just tell any spirits
present not to follow me home. Seems to work.

Zack
